category.name: EA Gateway
category.category_description: Preferences for the Teamcenter Gateway for Enterprise Applications (T4EA)

preference.name: T4X_IDGEN_max_loop
preference.preference_description: If the function T4X_IDGEN_EXTERNAL_VERIFY_OF_NUMBER is used, the T4X_IDGEN_max_loop preference defines how often the Teamcenter Gateway tries to get the next free Id.
